summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.6°C) and outside temperature (down 2.6°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 5544 lux) and cloud levels (up 229 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 13079 lux), cloud levels (up 1696 m), feels like temperature (up 5.4°C), and outside temperature (up 4.6°C) when compared to today.

Today’s cloud levels is 229.3m lower than yesterday, 1081.4m lower than past week, 1695.5m lower than past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 765m and a high of 2220m, averaging 1036.4m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, pleasant humidity levels. Showers, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Weather could become unsettled.
